name: Akhand Pratap Tiwari

projects.name: Comparative study of ML models
projects.description: Conducted a comprehensive study on 5 machine learning models for rainfall prediction: Linear Regression, KNN, Decision Trees, Logistic Regression, and SVM. Compared and Evaluated model performance using 7 metrics: Accuracy, Jaccard Index, F1-Score, LogLoss, MAE, MSE, and R2-Score.

projects.name: QR Scanner
projects.description: Developed a mobile app with Flutter and integrated with existing MongoDB within 3 hrs for a club on request, with immersive UI and smooth UX for fast and secure QR code scanning and validation. Processed 300+ validations at more than 3 events, handling 70+ validations concurrently per event with five devices using the app simultaneously.

projects.name: Who Borrowed What?
projects.description: App made with Flutter and Firebase to keep record of things that I have lent to others. I am forgetful.

projects.name: BeFAP
projects.description: Spearheaded a group of 5 in project exhibition to develop a website that aggregates product information from multiple websites and rank them based on 3 parameters. Implemented 2 AI models to summarize reviews and perform sentimental analysis on them. Integrated ranking system on the basis of 2 scores generated by AI models and price. Implemented 2 scraping agents to scrap the web for product info and reviews

projects.name: QT Passenger
projects.description: Led a group of 5 in semester project exhibition to develop two apps that work in tandem to provide TAXI service. Passenger can post where he wants to go and drivers bid on his post. Passenger then can select the lowest bid and board the drive. Location is also tracked for every driver at set intervals. This app works in conjunction with QT Driver and allows passengers to make posts and see/select bids made by the drivers. This app is for the passenger side.

projects.name: QT Driver
projects.description: Led a group of 5 in semester project exhibition to develop two apps that work in tandem to provide TAXI service. Passenger can post where he wants to go and drivers bid on his post. Passenger then can select the lowest bid and board the drive. Location is also tracked for every driver at set intervals. This app works in conjunction with QT Passenger and allows drivers to bid on available posts made by the passengers. This app is for the driver side.

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis on Reviews
projects.description: Sentiment Analysis using Linear SVC and TF-IDF (a statistical measure of importance). TF-IDF was used as weight factor for words. Dataset used was Amazon reviews dataset. This app was also used in BeFAP for sentimental analysis of product reviews.

projects.name: Auto Extractive Text Summarizer
projects.description: Summarization of documents using the famous algorithm TF-IDF (a statistical measure of importance). More important words have higher TF-IDF. Integrated this in BeFAP for summarization of collected reviews.

intro: My name is Akhand Pratap Tiwari. Currently I am Pursuing B.Tech. 3rd year (CSE) at VIT Bhopal.
I am particularly interested in AI and how actual Mathematics works under the hood to make AI work.
I also like to design and build UX/UI primarily for easier interation with AI models. I also like to make graphs (as in Maths using equations).
hobbies: I love making Graphs and Art.
I also like to write stories.
And most favourite, disassembling concepts, ideas and tech to see how they work.
expertise: Designing (in Figma) and implementing (in Flutter) UI and UX
experiences: Android Dev in Core Team at Google Developer Students Club: 9 Months
Member of Clean-Green Campus Team: At Present
Team lead for EPICS projects: At Present
Member of UX/UI design team of a new LINUX distro: At Present
achievements: Finalist of Geek for Geeks Rumble - DSA and coding competition
Semi-finalist of Code for good 2023 organized by JP Morgan Chase and Co.
Speaker at Flutter Forward and Flutter Forward Extended event at GDSC with 150+ attendees
Conducted a Guest Webinar with 200+ students joining
